summary: This is an internal email chain from July 2, 2019, regarding the submission of unit updates within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). It shows administrative coordination and a reminder about a deadline.

events.title: Unit Updates Deadline Reminder
events.description: An internal reminder is sent that unit updates are due and needed by the morning of July 2, 2019.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The email chain, dated July 2, 2019, concerns the submission of administrative 'unit updates'.
The communication highlights routine office coordination and deadline management within the prosecuting office handling the Epstein case.
